title: yes, and?
author: Ariana Grande
lyrics:
[00:48.06] In case you haven't noticed
[00:52.09] Well, everybody's tired
[00:56.18] And healin' from somebody
[01:00.00] Or somethin' we don't see just right
[01:04.09] Boy, come on, put your lipstick on (no one can tell you nothin')
[01:07.96] Come on and walk this way through the fire (don't care what's on their mind)
[01:11.94] And if you find yourself in a dark situation
[01:16.40] Just turn on your light and be like
[01:20.99] "Yes, and?"
[01:23.63] Say that shit with your chest, and
[01:27.70] Be your own fuckin' best friend
[01:31.96] Say that shit with your chest
[01:33.99] Keep movin' like, "What's next?"
[01:35.87] "Yes, and?"
[01:36.59] Now I'm so done with caring
[01:40.14] What you think, no, I won't hide
[01:44.20] Underneath your own projections
[01:48.51] Or change my most authentic life
[01:52.39] Boy, come on, put your lipstick on (no one can tell you nothin')
[01:56.41] Come on and walk this way through the fire (don't care what's on their mind)
[02:00.32] And if you find yourself in a dark situation
[02:04.50] Just turn on your light and be like
[02:09.33] "Yes, and?"
[02:12.15] Say that shit with your chest, and
[02:16.10] Be your own fuckin' best friend
[02:20.12] Say that shit with your chest
[02:22.42] Keep movin' like, "What's next?"
[02:24.46] "Yes, and?"
[02:27.12] My tongue is sacred, I speak upon what I like
[02:31.16] Protected, sexy, discerning with my time, my time
[02:35.10] Your energy is yours and mine is mine
[02:39.00] What's mine is mine
[02:41.15] My face is sitting, I don't need no disguise
[02:45.38] Don't comment on my body, do not reply
[02:49.29] Your business is yours and mine is mine
[02:53.35] Why do you care so much whose - I ride?
[02:57.04] Why?
[02:57.54] "Yes, and?"
[03:00.44] Say that shit with your chest, and
[03:04.74] Be your own fuckin' best friend
[03:08.68] Say that shit with your chest
[03:10.54] Keep movin' like, "What's next?"
[03:12.71] "Yes, and?"
[03:13.67] "Yes, and?"
[03:16.82] Say that shit with your chest and
[03:20.92] Be your own fuckin' best friend
[03:24.64] Say that shit with your chest
[03:26.76] Keep movin' like, "What's next?"
[03:28.77] "Yes, and?" (Yeah)
[03:30.04]
